summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of DHAN-DRAFT fintech dashboard completed. All backend APIs (25/25) working perfectly. Frontend testing successful with all 6 pages functional. Authentication, navigation, data visualization, calculators, and AI features working correctly.

integration_issues.issue: AI response generation takes 8-10+ seconds occasionally causing timeout in automated tests
integration_issues.note: Functionality works correctly, just slower response time during testing

passed_tests: Backend API authentication (demo login, registration, JWT token validation)
All 6 main page navigation (Overview, Learn, Markets, Portfolio & Tax, Risk & Safety, AI Advisor)
Overview page: Financial Health Score (75), Risk Personality (Conservative), Portfolio Allocation donut chart, AI Insight display
Learn page: 5 lessons loaded, lesson detail view, quiz submission and scoring, tax calculator (old vs new regime), bank rates table

Markets page: 8 stocks loaded with real-time data, stock selection and area chart display, AI prediction with confidence levels, user prediction (bullish/bearish), sentiment analysis with 6 news items, sector heatmap
Portfolio & Tax page: Portfolio summary cards (Value: Rs.6,11,428, Cost, Gain, Volatility), allocation and sector diversification charts, holdings list, capital gains calculator, FD tax calculator
Risk & Safety page: Transaction risk analysis form with risk scoring, fraud detection with keyword highlighting and probability scoring
AI Advisor page: Quick chips functionality, chat interface, AI response generation with strategy/tax/risk/sector analysis
Sidebar navigation: All 6 tabs working, active tab highlighting, user info display (Arjun Mehta), logout functionality
Authentication flow: Login, dashboard redirect, session management, logout with redirect to login

success_percentage.frontend: 98% (All core functionality working, minor AI response timing issue during automated testing)
